message: Let's split it evenly to start, no need for haggling!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the pie!
I'm not willing to give up 2/3 of the money so easily. Let's try to negotiate further.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but don't expect me to give away the whole pie!
I'm not happy with this offer. I think I can do better than 40% of the remaining value.
I'm taking a firmer stance. I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but don't think I'm getting taken advantage of!
I'm not willing to meet halfway. I need a better deal to make up for the lost value due to inflation.
I'm making a strong push for a bigger share. I think I deserve it after rejecting your previous offers.
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time.
I'm not willing to settle for 35% of the remaining value. I need a better deal to make it worth my while.
I'm making a final push for a bigger share. I think I deserve it after rejecting your previous offers.
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to accept this offer. I think I can do better than 30% of the remaining value.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to take a small risk to try to get a better deal.
This is my last chance to get a decent share. Accept or we both walk away with nothing!
I'm accepting your offer, Bob. I'd rather take $2,000 than walk away with nothing.
